OptionDisplayGroup.name: groupArsMagica2
OptionDisplayGroup.Description: Distribution options for Ars Magica 2 Ores.

Choice.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.
Very large, extremely rare motherlodes with long, thin tendrils.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Vinteum is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: arsmVinteumFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Ars Magica 2 Vinteum distributions

OptionNumeric.name: arsmVinteumSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Ars Magica 2 Vinteum distributions

Choice.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.
Very large, extremely rare motherlodes with long, thin tendrils.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Chimerite is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: arsmChimeriteFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Ars Magica 2 Chimerite distributions

OptionNumeric.name: arsmChimeriteSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Ars Magica 2 Chimerite distributions

OptionChoice.name: arsmBlueTopazDist
OptionChoice.Description: Controls how Blue Topaz is generated

Choice.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.
Very large, extremely rare motherlodes with long, thin tendrils.
Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore.

Choice.description: Blue Topaz is not generated in the world.

OptionNumeric.name: arsmBlueTopazFreq
OptionNumeric.Description: Frequency multiplier for Ars Magica 2 Blue Topaz distributions

OptionNumeric.name: arsmBlueTopazSize
OptionNumeric.Description: Size multiplier for Ars Magica 2 Blue Topaz distributions

Substitute.name: arsmOverworldBlockSubstitute0
Substitute.Comment: The global option deferredPopulationRange must be large enough to catch all ore clusters (>= 32).

Veins.name: arsmVinteumVeins
Veins.Description: Small, fairly rare motherlodes with 2-4 horizontal veins each.

Veins.name: arsmVinteumPreferredVeins
Veins.Description: Ore generation is doubled in preferred biomes.

Veins.name: arsmVinteumVeins
Veins.Description: Very large, extremely rare motherlodes. Each motherlode has many long slender branches--- so thin that parts of the branch won't contain any ore at all. This, combined with the incredible length of the branches, makes them more challenging to follow underground. Once found, however, a motherlode contains enough ore to keep a player supplied for a very long time. The rarity of these veins might be too frustrating in a single-player setting. In SMP, though, teamwork could make finding them much easier and the motherlodes are big enough to supply several people without shortage. This might be a good way to add challenge to multiplayer worlds. Credit: based on feedback by dyrewulf from the MC forums.

Veins.name: arsmVinteumPreferredVeins
Veins.Description: Ore generation is doubled in preferred biomes.

Cloud.name: arsmVinteumCloud
Cloud.Description: Large irregular clouds filled lightly with ore. These are huge, spanning several adjacent chunks, and consequently rather rare. They contain a sizeable amount of ore, but it takes some time and effort to mine due to low density. The intent for strategic clouds is that the player will need to actively search for one and then set up a semi-permanent mining base and spend some time actually mining the ore.

Veins.name: arsmVinteumVeins
Veins.Description: Single blocks, generously scattered through all heights (density is about that of vanilla iron ore). They will replace dirt and sandstone (but not grass or sand), so they can be found nearer to the surface than most ores. Intened to be used as a child distribution for large, rare strategic deposits that would otherwise be very difficult to find. Note that the frequency is multiplied by ground level to maintain a constant density, but not by ore frequency because it is assumed that the frequency of the parent distribution will already be scaled by that.

Cloud.name: arsmVinteumPreferredCloud
Cloud.Description: Ore generation is doubled in preferred biomes.

Veins.name: arsmVinteumVeins
Veins.Description: Ore generation is doubled in preferred biomes.

StandardGen.name: arsmVinteumStandard
StandardGen.Description: A master preset for standardgen ore distributions.
